attributes.action: remove the legal hurdles to enable war crime suspects to be brought to justice in the UK.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Currently, suspected war criminals can use the UK as a safe haven from prosecution because the relevant international law is not fully enshrined in UK law. We believe that this anomaly ought to be urgently rectified, and be made retrospective, to finally bring high profile war crime suspects to justice in the UK.

reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
